text: is a 1953 Japanese drama movie directed by Yasujirō Ozu and starring Chishū Ryū, Chieko Higashiyama, Setsuko Hara, Haruko Sugimura, So Yamamura, Kuniko Miyake. It was distributed by Shochiku. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 drama movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Japanese-language movies Category:Movies directed by Yasujirō Ozu
title: Tokyo Story
